name: ParameterByTypeTransformerTest
description: Tests for the ParameterByTypeTransformer class, focusing on various type conversions.

nested_classes.name: TestJacksonDefaultTransformer
nested_classes.description: Internal class implementing ParameterByTypeTransformer using Jackson ObjectMapper.

nested_classes.name: TestEnum
nested_classes.description: Internal enum used for testing enum conversion.

test_cases.name: should_convert_null_to_null
test_cases.description: Tests the transformation of null to null.

test_cases.name: should_convert_null_to_optional
test_cases.description: Tests the transformation of null to an empty Optional.

test_cases.name: should_convert_null_to_optional_generic
test_cases.description: Tests the transformation of null to an empty Optional with a generic type.

test_cases.name: should_convert_to_string
test_cases.description: Tests the transformation of a string to a string.

test_cases.name: should_convert_to_optional_string
test_cases.description: Tests the transformation of a string to an Optional string.

test_cases.name: should_convert_to_object
test_cases.description: Tests the transformation of a string to an Object.

test_cases.name: should_convert_to_big_integer
test_cases.description: Tests the transformation of a string to a BigInteger.

test_cases.name: should_convert_to_big_decimal
test_cases.description: Tests the transformation of a string to a BigDecimal.

test_cases.name: should_convert_to_byte
test_cases.description: Tests the transformation of a string to a Byte.

test_cases.name: should_convert_to_short
test_cases.description: Tests the transformation of a string to a Short.

test_cases.name: should_convert_to_integer
test_cases.description: Tests the transformation of a string to an Integer.

test_cases.name: should_convert_to_optional_integer
test_cases.description: Tests the transformation of a string to an Optional Integer.

test_cases.name: should_convert_to_long
test_cases.description: Tests the transformation of a string to a Long.

test_cases.name: should_convert_to_float

test_cases.name: should_convert_to_double
